snippet.title: Roguelike Hero Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to PC and console later 2019. Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/887680/ROGUELIKE_HERO/

“Heroes in Chinese Swordsman fictions are always righteous, powerful and honorable. That’s too far-fetched.” In Roguelike Hero, you create a character growing from shameless nobody. 
Roguelike hero is a “silly” action game. Players play as a walk-on actor, struggling to get a good role. Each stage is a action movie set piece and players fight though various enemies with absurd and silly ways to complete the filming. 

Developed by Carrya Tech and published by X.D. Network, Roguelike Hero is set to release on PC, PS4 and Nintendo Switch.
